author: Madurai Bureau
text:
The district unit of the women’s wing of All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (AIADMK) has taken the lead in the campaign for the coming Assembly elections as its volunteers distributed booklets with the full text of Chief Minister Jayalalaithaa’s reply to the Governor’s address made in the Assembly.

Kavitha Sasikumar, district women’s wing secretary and vice-chairperson of Ramanathapuram Municipality, who organised the ‘Magalir Ani Ezhuchi Prachara Payanam” here on Monday, said that they had listed out the achievements of the government in the booklets distributed at every household in the town. Minister for Sports and Youth Welfare S. Sundararaj inaugurated the campaign and walked along with the women’s wing volunteers.The Minister was joined by A. Anwar Raja, MP, district secretary Dharmar and other office bearers .

Dindigul

Hundreds of AIADMK women’s wing members took out a rally here on Monday.

Flagged off by Minister for Power R. Viswanthan, the rally started at Kumaran Park and ended at MGR statue. The members distributed the booklets to vendors, pedestrians and shopkeepers on Corporation Road, Main Road and market area.

Theni

In Theni, the women took out a rally which started at Canara bank and ended at Allinagaram municipality. Party’s district youth wing president O.P. Ravindranath flagged off the rally.
title: AIIADMK women distribute “achievement” booklets
